name: Accompanying
description: Study and practice emphasizing the use of the piano in school music teaching. Accompaniment of solo songs, choral music, instrumental solos and ensembles. Practical experience in transposition, sight harmonization, improvisation and sight-reading. Assignments appropriate to the level of keyboard facility. Primarily intended for Music Education students.
prerequisites: TMU105Y1/107Y1, in Year 2, RCM Grade 8 level Piano or equivalent/P.I.
